text: Art ought never to be considered except in its relations with its ideal beauty.
author: Alfred de Vigny

text: The U.S. states that allow for citizens' initiatives tend to have fewer laws and lower taxes than the ones that don't. But the beauty of the system is that it encourages the spread of best practice.
author: Daniel Hannan

text: Are we changing the idea of what beauty is? Let's hope so. I'm not the typical Hollywood beauty. Let's hope we're looking at the insides of people a little more.
author: Anne Heche

text: Wit is more necessary than beauty and I think no young woman ugly that has it, and no handsome woman agreeable without it.
author: William Wycherley

text: Science shows us truth and beauty and fills each day with a fresh wonder of the exquisite order which governs our world.
author: Polykarp Kusch
